title: New GTA Definitive Edition is hilariously bad

comments.comment: They removed all the original games from steam and other digital platforms to make room for this.  They also wanted to sue modders to prevent competition between the original and definitive edition.  I expected more from Rockstar.

Gaming Company: makes Bad Product
(People dislike it)
Gaming Company: We are being Targeted, this is a hate crime
Stuff like this should be released on April fool's day.
I hate how San Andreas tried to look realistic and then they were like let's change the art style completely and say it looks good
The worst part is definitely the fact that people have been modding the 3 original games and updating the graphics all these years and this version made by a big studio looks worse than the original

"I thought Rockstar was above this"

Didn't we all
now Pewds can say his iconic line: "its evolving, just backwards"
This game is basically when you forget to do your homework but it's due in 5 minutes

"they put their heart and soul into this"

they literally hired an app-making company to do the definitive edition.
I like how the rating dropped by 0.2 by the time recording was finished.
It’s literal garbage. Idk how they disrespected us like this.

In CyberPunk's defence, they tried a lot of new things and mechanics and worked overtime to meet deadline but failed. All Rockstar had to do was follow the damn classic and that's it they messed it up. There was no rush, just pure lack of respect and care for the games and the fanbase that made Rockstar Rockstar.
Rockstar: "I've got an awesome idea! Let's rerelease an old game, somehow make it worse, and slap a $60 price tag on it!"
Most of the models look like playing character from "Crab Game".
Evil Rockstar be like: we are releasing GTA 6 next year and GTA 7 the year after that
We need someone influencial like PewDiePie to call out the garbage that's been going on in the gaming industry lately. Nice!
The original literally looks way better than the "definitive" remake. How did they even consider selling this.
When the original is better than the remaster

I remember when GTA 3 was out. One of my friends was like, you know there's a game where you can run around town and hit old women with bat. I was like STFU, that can't be real!! Man those graphics looked so unbelievable to me back than.
He didn't see how awful the rain looked, one of the worst rains in a game

This game isn't fully developed by Rockstar games, but by Grove Street Games. They did most of the work. But having Rockstar accepting the work is what surprises me. I thought they had higher standards

ORIGINAL: "That shit is beautiful!"
"DEFINITIVE": "Man, what's this? Shit looks ridiculous"

PewDiePie: every big game company is bad now

Minecraft: I am 4 parallel universes ahead of you
”Like it says in the book, we are blessed and cursed”   -  Big Smoke.
The true definition of "It's Evolving, Just backwards."
Rockstar gave us a childhood just to take it away again… Cruelty.
4:54 Sweet getting yeeted outta the cutscene
Pewds not playing Definitive Edition because he is scared of invisible bridges.
I like how Cyberpunk is a name for all the glitchy games now
The thing is... these games needed a REMAKE, not a remaster like this was.

"There are no bad games, just bad players"
-Developers of the GTA remakes

- So, should we make the characters look more human and realistic, like 343 did with the Halo remakes, or should we keep the low-polygon models for the oldschool feel?
- How about we make them look like the characters from the jehova's witness cartoons?

"How did this happen"
Well first they took the mobile port of the original as a start base.
Then they ran the graphics through an AI enhancer.
Presumably after that they shipped it.
They did CJ’s girl Denise dirty and everyone be lookin like fortnite characters
2021 Is The Year Of "Damn, That Was Disappointing."

Rockstar be like:
"IM A SUCCESS, A CELEBRITY, I CANT BE TOUCHED!"
-Big Smoke
You joke about the user score being disabled. But I feel like that'll happen soon XD
They did GTA San Andreas dirty man it was the most advanced game of it's time.
It's almost as San Andreas has permanently enabled "city riot" mode just like when you start the "Riot" mission lmao

"Why are all big game companies going to shit" you see it all started when Activision made a fuck ton of money off MW2 and BO1. Then Ea started raking in money with micro transactions and now it's not about making good games its about making something that makes money
Three of the best, certainly most influential games of all time. All they needed to do was put a quick coat of wax and polish on them. How? How did this go wrong?
I miss the 2000s. We get a Complete Game. Served with whatever the most cutting edge technology at the time. That is why we feel nostalgia. Hyped games at the time are really perfect

It's funny that some of the bug that showed here actually happened to me in OG version of the game, example the Floating car driven by NPC or the car stuck on the ground of under the bridge that will not blow up unless you're near the car but you can look at it with a Camera or Sniper, sometimes another car would get stuck with it creating a giant mess on the road.
The sad part is there's modders out there that have made a remake with graphic upgrades and it's better then what Rockstar could come up with.
I'm not even angry, I'm just disappointed. Rockstar you were the chosen one, you supposed to create great games, not ruin them. Bring balance to gamers... not leave them in darkness.
60$ tho they r crazy, tf is this company we all gonna die before gta 7
1:56 dude, if they hired MDickie to do the remake, it'd be MUCH better. His games are actually great and have infinite replay value.
I can't fathom how a billion dollar company can fuck up a game like this

"They put their heart and soul into this"

Right, because they don't have any
It's not even a remake. It's just a lazy mod. There are literally fan-made mods that are way better than this
5:32 particles be like.
Actually the modders of GTA SA did better than the actual company.

Pretty impressive how a gaming company in 2021 can take a 17 year old game and make it look more like shit than it did in 2004…

insert “it’s evolving just backwards” meme here
"We need to maximize the profits. Let's hire a few 9 year olds to design the remake. What could go wrong?"

Me: Man, why is my back killing me?!
Also me in front of the computer: 00:07
Rockstars took the line "It's Not a Bug, It's a Feature.'" way too seriously.

Everyone SHOULD be way more vocal about the removal of dislikes on this site. It's a way for corporations to remove any bad negative thinking and a way of controlling the narrative on things. If Metacritic does the same, you can bet it's because game corps paid them enough money because they don't want to lose sales for shitty development.

I never thought that anyone could make san andreas look bad , rockstar surprised me again
just not the way I thought they would
5:10 This must be the work of an enemy stand!
"Terrible dogshit remake" That's a perfect definition

This should be a far bigger controversy than cyberpunk even thought of being. At least CD Projekt had the excuse of  creating something new.  Think of how much money rockstar makes on their shark cards, and its a huge selling game.

As someone who used to be a game tester at Rockstar I can clearly say that the reason why the game is so shitty and buggy beyond belief is that the remastered games are all built using a 3rd party game engine (unreal) while the originals all used Rockstar proprietary engine. Yes it's not an excuse to make the game so lame but the game was not meant to be remastered in unreal. They should have remastered it using RAGE tbh

Dude, imagine going from Red Dead Redemption 2 to Hard Times 2: Electric Boogaloo in THREE YEARS. How? How do you do it Rockstar? The sheer level of quality whiplash makes it so close to being impressive.

Gaming company: releases bad game
People: hate it
Gaming companies: wanna see us do it again?
They literally could have just released the old games, changing nothing, and just called it the definitive edition and it would have been better then what we got.
I love how it went from being rated 0.7 during the beginning and then later being rated 0.5 in the same video. Classic.
6 months later and I play Vice City definitive edition and a vehicle is hovering about 10 feet over mine.
I love how mafia remake was actually good and rockstar just put texture mod and run the game basically on the mobile version lmao

Remember folks, youtube turned off dislikes to protect predatory companies like these.
Also it's funny how people like to treat video games similar to physical products when talking about piracy (you wouldn't steal a car...etc bs), but it's not the same when video game companies release unfinished products at full price. Like if I bought a faulty blender from target I'd get a refund no-questions asked, but with video games there has to be a massive outrage mob for anything to happen.
At this point rockstar is evolving, just backwards.
1:58 Mdickie got the recognition from the plipplop himself

This is a perfect example of the saying "If you want something done right the first time do it yourself." Rockstar should have never outsourced another studio to do the remaster. Not like they're busy making any games right now, just more GTA online shit. They would have done a much better job with the remaster themselves.

"The same things that make us laugh make us cry"
-Big smoke
Well, it's good that we can check the game on Youtube before buying.
0:37 we must Protect MineCraft at any cost guys

Rockstar before: let's make great games! That try to be realistic 

Rockstar now: bad graphics update with 60$ more!
"We never make a buggy game such as Cyberpunk" -Rockstar

GTA Fans: "Ey Rockstar what made you flip out like that man? Was it GTA V or what?"
Rockstar: "I got caught up in the Money, the Power..."
pewds pronouncing Definitive as Definite is reminescent of him calling LineOus

The non-rotating burger might be solid evidence that they just used an AI to upscale all the textures instead of actually working on it. Cause the AI wouldn't be able to figure out it was moving right?

INB4 they remove user scores.

"If the people disagree, they must be silenced!"  -Joe Executive
As someone who’s studying to be a game designer, rockstar really didn’t care about making a better version of the game they just wanted to milk the series
For some reason, the looking back in 3rd person view, and the car getting wider while you wiggle, made me Laugh for 5 minutes or more that it started to hurt so bad I couldn’t breath anymore.

"Things that makes us laugh...
Makes us cry"
- Big Smoke

"I got caught up by the money... The power... I don't give a fuck..."
-Rockstars, probably.

Credits:
Delta for reminded me of the last words.

"Is there anyone Left?"
Sive: cuts to BF 2042 climbing building strats

Me: I like the way you think
The world needs a pewdiepie and gray still plays crossover in GTA, very badly.

2 of the 3 guys: runs into car killing themselves
The game: "That was entirely your fault!"
10 yrs later :”lets play the new gta definitive definitive edition!”
This is like the Silent Hill HD Collection all over again, but arguably worse.
Denise's new face and CJ's camera front face perfect couples
Rockstar right now is like: "can you unrelease a game?"
"The original feels like the actual remake" and that says a lot, Rockstar
Missed the best one where they turned a nut (the hexagonal metal thing you put on screws) into a perfectly circular one lmao
You know, i always wanted rockstar to remaster GTA IV because it was a masterpiece, but now I don't.

This definitive edition just makes me wanna play the originals even more. 

Actually, Imma start up my PS2 right now and go play some of the OG San Andreas
I love how all of the characters look like they’re made of clay.  “Definitive Edition” more like “Arts and Crafts Edition”.

I've really enjoyed playing GTA SA on my PS2 as a young girl. It was my favorite game. I've loved the port they made some years ago on Android. 
And I'm now loving that my favorite Youtuber is destroying this dumb remake they are pushing now.
1:35 they looked like runescape character at the bottom
It really leaves me wondering how a Remake of 3 legendary games looks like a fanmade knockoff on a cd-rom that you would find at a flew market
